name: The Jesus Toucher
description: Redid Touch Jesus by B Crunk to fit my own tastes. Soz.
author: matthewkocanda

reviews.text: I had to sub JF for cap sweet at same %. Mixed at 80% VG. Steeped 1 week. Great fluffy, smooth, delicious peachy strawb vape. Not overpowering, not too weak, just perfect. Reminds me of a peach melba. The slightly fragrant fa peach and strawberries sit great with the cookie and custard. MIX this for a fab ADV or just a treat vape. THANKS for this.
Another great fruit amalgamation the peach and strawberry really compliment each other
